name: Stone Stance
description: The ancestral style of the Sakai clan. Traditional and solid, it excels against opponents wielding swords.

name: Water Stance
description: Fluid and relentless. This style allows the warrior to flow around defenses, perfect for breaking the guard of shielded enemies.

name: Wind Stance
description: Fast and evasive. Specifically designed to counter the reach of spears by knocking them aside and closing the distance.

name: Moon Stance
description: Powerful and overwhelming. Uses heavy spinning attacks to stagger large, heavily armed opponents.
